# Orchestra

ORCHESTRATION

Orchestra is a Modern Data Orchestration Platform, that gives you everything you need to build end to end AI and Data Workflows using MotherDuck.

The Orchestra x Motherduck integration allows data teams to easily move data to Motherduck using duckdb/python, execute queries on Motherduck directly and even run dbt-core on Motherduck. No infrastructure to manage, no learning curve, instant set-up.
